column4: hi I can cd into a dir and run python program.py, but why can't I run python <dir>/program.py . please help. also there is no channel #python, when I talk into #python-unregistered , it says " Cannot send ot channel " error.
firstly, you need to register your nick with nickserv
secondly, you *should* be able to do python dir/thing.py
pastebin the command line and the error you get, verbatim
